adpeEquivalent.message: ADP#Abiotic Depletion Potential (use of natural resources, minerals and metals) in kg antimony equivalent (kg eq. SB)

analysisInProgress.message: Analysis in progress. Start browsing on the current tab, then come back here to get stats !#Analysis in progress message

autoscrollPercentInput.message: Enter % to scroll for page's analysis#Enter % to scroll

autoscrollPxInput.message: Enter pixels number to scroll for page's analysis#Enter pixels number to scroll

carIndicator.message: Km by car#Label for car indicator

clearBrowserCacheButton.message: Clear cache#Cache cleaning corrects certain errors, such as those related to website loading or formatting

csvColumnsLabel.message: Date;Url;Uncompressed size(b);Compressed size(kb);DOM;GES Data Center(gCO2e);GES Network(gCO2e);GES User(gCO2e);GES Total(gCO2e); GES Score; Grade; Country; CarbonIntensity; NumberRequest#csvColumnsLabel

dataCenterTotal.message: Data center#Total GES emissions of data center

deleteAllConfirmMessage.message: Do you really want to delete all history ?#Delete All Confirm Message

eitherFor.message: Either for #Label for informations about visits part. 1

errorNoToken.message: No CO2 token found, the extension may not work#Env variable not found

firstResults.message: First results received !#First analysis resulted have been computed.

gesGrade.message: Grade#A grade of A->F (the higher the grade, the better the webpage!)

gesIntensity.message: Server energy mix#Carbon intensity in gCO2eq/Kwh of electricity consumed by server location

gesScore.message: Score#The higher the score (closer to 100), the better the webpage!

gesUserIntensityShort.message: User.I#Carbon intensity in gCO2eq/Kwh of electricity consumed by user location

infoMix.message: Your emissions depend on the energy mix of the country in which you are located, and in which the website is hosted. This energy mix can vary from hour to hour and season to season:#Infos pour comprendre l'impact du mix énergétiques

launchAnalysisButton.message: Analysis#The analysis launch does not take into account the part of the screen hidden by the devtools

launchAnalysisButtonWithAutoScrollButton.message: Auto Scrolling#Launch Analysis with auto scroll

menuText.message: GreenTrackR is install in your browser and accessible via the devtool panel (F12 or CMD + ALT + i sur Mac)

messageResultsDetail.message: Detailed table of user journey analysis

nbRequest.message: HTTP requests#Number of requests without extentions 'without cache (with cache)'

noContentPhraseEvaluation.message: Estimate the carbon footprint of your website#Message when you arrive on the evaluation page and the analysis is not yet launched

noFullData.message: Localisation (Server ou User) undefined, use simulator for show results

pageTotal.message: Page total#Total GES emissions of website

paramRetryDescription.message: Set the maximum number of attempts to avoid errors in computing HTTP requests for the websites you want to analyze.

paramTokenCo2Description.message: GreenTrackR uses the 'CO2signal' API from Electricity Maps. To use this API, you need an access token, you can get it on the following link 'Go to api portal' -> #https://www.co2signal.com/
